name: Entangled Demo
description:
DISCLAIMER: EVERYTHING IS SUBJECT TO CHANGE. THIS IS A SKINNLESS DEMO BUILD OF ENTANGLED.

Welcome to the Entangled Demo itch.io page. I am Bim, and this is my puzzle platformer Entangled. This is a very early 'vertical slice' build of the game Entangled, meant to show case a majority of the gameplay that will be expanded on for the full release. 

This demo release is very much an early alpha of the game, which means there is lots of room for your feedback so I can make the best version of Entangled there is!
